\ Tank War Game Version 1.0

Xiaohui Liu 
 Yuanhai Shi 
 Suhao Qin

\
1.Press New Game button to start the game 
 2. Use the keyboard on the phone to control the tank. 
 To start to move the tank, press enter button 
 use up down left right button to move the tank 
 use enter button to shoot
